author: Borges
quote: Being with you or without you is how I measure my time

author: W.H. Auden
quote: If equal affection cannot be, let the more loving one be me.

author: Unna Vida
quote: Nooru senmam nammaku podhuma? Vera varam ethum kaetpoma? Saagavaram kaetpom andha saamiya

author: Water Packet
quote: Ayo Hindi la sonna, naan pyaar karuthama

author: Prateek Kuhad
quote: I could never speak in tunes before, but for you I could write a symphony

author: Iruvar
quote: Unnodu naan irundha ovvoru mani thuliyum, marana padukaiyillum marakkaadhu kanmaniye

author: Jaane Tu Ya Jaane Na
quote: Koi air ho ya na ho, thu hai main hoon bus

author: C.S. Lewis
quote: To love at all is to be vulnerable. Love anything and your heart will be wrung and possibly broken. If you want to make sure of keeping it intact you must give it to no one, not even an animal. Wrap it carefully round with hobbies and little luxuries; avoid all entanglements. Lock it up safe in the casket or coffin of your selfishness. But in that casket, safe, dark, motionless, airless, it will change. It will not be broken; it will become unbreakable, impenetrable, irredeemable. To love is to be vulnerable.
